name: Forsaken Champions
description:
Forsaken Champions is a one-of-a-kind blend of ARPG and CRPG.
Gather your party and venture in a high fantasy lore as a company of up to 8.

  • Deep Character Customization

Play as any one of five races: Human, Dwarf, Elf, Gnome and Orc and combine two of the base classes and create unique archetype and specialization.
Personalize your appearance, character story, motivation, flaws and ideals.

  • Carve your Own Adventure

Select our official campaign or create your own with our never ending campaign system where you can build fully editable campaign containing an infinite amount of map, creatures, events, quests and dialogues.

  • Explore the Campaigns

Pick your character and team up with up to 8 players to explore the maps, with our automatic scaling system, the more people the more fun !

  • Adventure Master

Choose to lead the story by being the Adventure Master, and have access to unique control on the progression flow by playing as monsters, dynamic spawn objects and NPC, control the weather or even directly affecting the players.

  • Development Discord

Make sure to join our Discord channel and stay up to speed with the latest development, get special beta access and directly influence the game direction.
https://discord.gg/PFKQM7fsqN
